query:
SELECT
            u.username,
            tg.id AS title_group_id,
            tg.name AS title_group_name
        FROM users u
        LEFT JOIN torrents t ON t.id = $1
        LEFT JOIN edition_groups eg ON eg.id = t.edition_group_id
        LEFT JOIN title_groups tg ON tg.id = eg.title_group_id
        WHERE u.id = $2
